short_summary: Purchase of Environmental Chambers and related equipment for the Naval Engineering Test Establishment
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to purchase a Large Environmental Chamber and related equipment, delivered to and installed at the Naval Engineering Test Establishment (NETE) in LaSalle, Quebec.
full_summary:
**Large Environmental Chamber Project**

### Summary

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a bid proposal for the purchase of a Large Environmental Chamber (LEC) and related equipment. The LEC will be delivered to and installed at the Naval Engineering Test Establishment (NETE) in LaSalle, Quebec, replacing an existing obsolete system.

### Key Contract Date

* Publication Date: 2022 November 09
* Tender Closing Date: 2023 March 08, 14:00:00 EST

### Key Contract Details

* Contracting Entity: Department of National Defence
* Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0K2, Canada
* Request for Proposal (RFP) Number: W8472-225851
* Solicitation Number: W8472-225851
* Amendment Number: Amendment 5
* Date of Amendment: 2023 February 20
* Technology Group (GSIN): N6636 - Environmental Chambers and Related Equipment

### Deliverables

The successful bidder will be required to deliver the following:

* One (1) Large Environmental Chamber (LEC)
* Spare parts list including all components and ancillary equipment
* Technical Data Package (TDP) for maintenance support at NETE
* Acoustic dampening package
* Training and necessary training materials

### Submission and Evaluation Criteria

Submission: Proposals must be submitted electronically in accordance with the Official Government Tendering file package.

Evaluation Criteria: Evaluation of bids will be based on satisfaction of the requirements outlined in the RFP document.

### Additional Information

Tenders are being solicited under the trade agreements: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and many others.

Attachments can be accessed through the link: [Provided by the Government of Canada](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/20/10fc7635042383685ca34a840ef24e6c/eng_amendment_005_extension_qas_-_w8472-225851.pdf) 

Contact Information:
Dianne Montgomery, Dianne.montgomery@forces.gc.ca. [No Telephone or Fax number provided]
